reviews.review: jogo muito bom , perfomance muito boa , ótima para aquecer a mira as atualizações estao cada vez melhorando!

Amazing game!!!! I have so much fun whenever I play it, the community is super nice and polite! Huge thanks to all of my teammates that I ran into in competitive matches! You guys are the best, I feel blessed! BEST GAME, BEST GAMING COMMUNITY EVER :)))) <3

Welcome. Welcome to City 17.



You have chosen, or been chosen, to relocate to one of our finest remaining urban centers. I thought so much of City 17 that I elected to establish my Administration here, in the Citadel so thoughtfully provided by Our Benefactors. I have been proud to call City 17 my home. And so, whether you are here to stay, or passing through on your way to parts unknown, welcome to City 17. It's safer here.

I edit my review to say to new players not to play this game.. 

Whenever you start this game and get addicted you will notice there are alot of toxic players in this game ruining it for everyone.'

You enter a game to spend 1.5 hours of your time.. And you end up crying because of the toxic teammates in this game. Valve does little to nothing to ban these kind of players.
